vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.22.14;
son of: Harhas (H2745);
father of: Shallum (H7967H); also called Tokhath (Qere. Ketiv: Tokahath; KJV: Tikvath) at 2Ch.34.22;
Another name of tiq.vah (תִּקְוָה "Tikvah" H8616)
§ Tikvath or Tikvah = "hope"
father of Shallum, the husband of the prophetess Huldah in the time of king Josiah of Judah
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
特瓦 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "盼望"
沙龍的父親, 女先知戶勒大的丈夫, 猶大王約西亞時的人 #代下 34:22|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
特瓦 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "盼望"
沙龙的父亲, 女先知户勒大的丈夫, 犹大王约西亚时的人 #代下 34:22|
